dialogue: Suffering succotash! Could it really be? Oh, Heavens to Betsy: you've brought me the finest pair of contrapunctum-coverers I've ever borne witness to. I'm truly in your debt; tell me, young Quinn, what's your nickel?
How can I repay you for this kind gift?
Well, you said you had something better than coffee...
Of course! Though to be fair, most anything is better than that pigeon sweat. Here you go, my friend.
But the boss asked for coffee.
Fiddlesticks! No man on God's green earth can lay eyes on that without desperately craving a cuppa. Trust me on this.
